titleStmt.title: The Papists plot of firing discovered, in a perfect account of the late fire in Fetter-Lane, London, the tenth day of April last whereby it plainly appears who are the instruments of this work : as also the rewards they are to have, and what would be the dismal effects if this firing trade had gone on : published by way of caution to all masters of families to beware what servants they entertain into their houses.

The Papists plot of firing discovered, in a perfect account of the late fire in Fetter-Lane, London, the tenth day of April last whereby it plainly appears who are the instruments of this work : as also the rewards they are to have, and what would be the dismal effects if this firing trade had gone on : published by way of caution to all masters of families to beware what servants they entertain into their houses.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
